se.dat255.bulletinferno.controller
Class LoadingScreenController

java.lang.Object
  se.dat255.bulletinferno.controller.SimpleController
      se.dat255.bulletinferno.controller.LoadingScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, Controller
public class LoadingScreenController
extends SimpleController

A screen that handles loading and allocation of all assets that are required in the game. This is to prevent the game from slowing down due to resource loading which could take time depending on the speed of the secondary memory.

Nested Class Summary
static interface LoadingScreenController.FinishedLoadingEventListener
          A listener for when the loading the loading screen is doing is finished.

Constructor Detail

LoadingScreenController

public LoadingScreenController(ResourceManager resourceManager,
                               MasterController masterController)
Initiates the loading screen and its view. Also starts the loading of the resourceManager.

Note: This screen will load textures without using the resource manager.
